Description:
------------
It took as much as 16 years since the platforming Sonic & Knuckles. Today, for those who are covered ezhemaniey, a new project comes Sonic the Hedgehog 4: Episode 1 - a direct continuation of the celebrated series debut game.
Sonic acts quickly, and you with the same speed figure out what the story is built on the idea of ??retribution. As soon as the main villain Dr. Eggman (Dr Eggman) has lost his space station, the Death Egg (the Death Egg) in the game Sonic & Knuckles, he immediately began to build a cunning plan for revenge. Now bad guys (Badniks), servants of Dr. Eggman, that turned poor little creatures, friends Sonic, conspired to take away the Chaos Emeralds (Chaos Emeralds) from under the noses of the heroic hedgehog.
The game takes place in bright decorations, referring to the world-famous game series, released in 1990. Now you can open a new page supersonic epic Sonic!

Features:
---------
Embark on a journey through uncharted territory to new and in the end Defeat the evil Dr. Eggman.
You are waiting for the new and improved old techniques - such as the classic Sonic Spin Dash and Homing Attack.
Beware the sinister plans of Dr. Eggman. He will stop at nothing to get rid of Sonic.

Operating system: Windows XP/Vista/7
Processor: Pentium IV 2.4GHz

Hard disk space: 400 MB
Audio device: compatible with DirectX
Graphics: ATI Radeon X1800 or NVIDIA GeForce 7800
